markdownRemark.html: Located 3 km from Seville, is a 18-hole golf course where visitors can play if accompanied by a member. Plain course with three lakes and bunkers. Wide fairways are separated by pine trees and palm trees. Small, flat greens are surrounded by water hazards.

frontmatter.title: Real Club Pineda de Sevilla
frontmatter.description: Real Club Pineda de Sevilla - Located 3 km from Seville, is a 18-hole golf course where visitors can play if accompanied by a member. Plain course with three lakes and bunkers. Wide fairways are separated by pine trees and palm trees. Small, flat greens are surrounded by water hazards.
frontmatter.address: Avenida de Jerez s/n, 41012  Sevilla, Spain
